title: 820-00045 SSD not recognized (12" Macbook)
message: I received a 12" Retina Macbook with no power. I reflowed the board and now power on and everything works but it does not recognized that the SSD is installed. Not even in device system information nor disk utility.

title: 820-00045 SSD not recognized (12" Macbook)
message: You "reflowed" the board....right. You realize there are undefilled chips that get destroyed? How is reflowing a repair? What did you repair? This board is probably trash now.
